data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Santiago de Cuba, Cuba to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Santiago de Cuba, Cuba
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Santiago de Cuba to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Santiago de Cuba prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Jesus, 1,047,000 people live in the state of Santiago de Cuba. Please, give them 209 new simple churches this year.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Palma Soriano
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Palma Soriano, Santiago de Cuba, Cuba.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 118,683 believers in the state of Santiago de Cuba.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who are far from you in Santiago de Cuba. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.section_summary:
the state of Santiago de Cuba, Cuba has a population of 1,047,000.

We estimate Santiago de Cuba has 118,683 people who might know Jesus, 469,855 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 458,462 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 469,855 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
